text: José Crisologo Sorra (9 March 1929 - 21 January 2021) was a Filipino Roman Catholic bishop. Sorra was born in Manila, Philippines. He became a priest in 1956. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Virac Philippines, from 1974 to 1993 and as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Legazpi from 1993 to 2005. Sorra died on 21 January 2021, aged 91.Diocese of Legazpi ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Filipino Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Manila
title: José Crisologo Sorra
